name: ai-chat-box
description: AI Chat Box with React frontend and Cloudflare Workers backend

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:workers
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../workers && npm install
scripts.clean: cd frontend && npm run clean && cd ../workers && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json
scripts.fresh-install: npm run clean && npm run install:all

author: limuran
